p:
SARS-CoV-2 is a novel coronavirus known to cause the disease “coronavirus disease-19” or “COVID-19”. It emerged in late 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China, and likely has its origin in bat populations.
94 On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 to be a worldwide pandemic.
95 It has been estimated to cause severe disease in 16% of cases.
96 Older individuals are particularly susceptible to severe illness, with 80% of deaths occurring in individuals aged 65 years and older.
94
